DeleteJobRecords.title: DeleteJobRecords
DeleteJobRecords.summary: Deletes one or more job records that are in the final state from a specified cluster.

DeleteJobs.title: DeleteJobs
DeleteJobs.summary: Deletes one or more jobs from a specified cluster.

DeletePool.title: DeletePool
DeletePool.summary: You can execute this statement to delete a resource pool.

DescribeJobMetricData.title: DescribeJobMetricData
DescribeJobMetricData.summary: You can query the monitoring time series dataset of a job by specifying the job array index and query metric parameters.

DescribeJobMetricLast.title: DescribeJobMetricLast
DescribeJobMetricLast.summary: Queries all instant monitoring metrics in the job array list by specifying a specific job array index list.

GetImage.title: GetImage
GetImage.summary: Obtains the information about an image.

GetJob.title: GetJob
GetJob.summary: Obtains the details of an execution job.

GetPool.title: GetPool
GetPool.summary: Obtains the details of a resource pool.

ListActionPlanActivities.title: ListActionPlanActivities
ListActionPlanActivities.summary: Queries the execution status of an execution plan.

ListActionPlans.title: ListActionPlans
ListActionPlans.summary: Queries the list of execution plans.

ListExecutorEvents.title: ListExecutorEvents
ListExecutorEvents.summary: Queries the running event list of one or more executers.

ListJobs.title: ListJobs
ListJobs.summary: Queries the jobs in a cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are bound to one or more Instant resources.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Create and bind tags to Instant resource list

UnTagResources.title: UnTagResources
UnTagResources.summary: Unbind tags from Instant resource list. If the tag is not bound to other resources, the tag is automatically deleted.

UpdateActionPlan.title: UpdateActionPlan
UpdateActionPlan.summary: Adjust the resource scale of the execution plan or modify the execution status
